text: Hey <@UFEK2AS87> if you include the `&properties=amount` in your request URL in addition to what you have. You can include the `properties` parameter multiple times

Hello, I'm really new to the API. I'm want to create a new deal when a paypal checkout button is used in one of my HubSpot pages. To create my node application to work with the HubSpot API i will always need to have another server to work on that, right. There is no way to do it directly in the HubSpot backend?
Correct, you cannot put server-side code on HubSpot. You need have your server communicate with the APIs we provide.
